original: intros T U F ProperF f CondP. split. - intros eps. destruct (CondP eps) as [P [PF CondP']]. exists P. split. + auto. + intros u v Pu Pv u' v' Fuu' Fvv'. apply CondP'; auto. - intros [y LimF]. intros P PF. destruct (ProperF P PF) as [x Px]. exists y. apply LimF. intros eps. destruct (CondP eps) as [P' [PF' CondP']]. specialize (LimF ep). apply LimF. exists P'. split. + apply PF'. + intros u v Pu Pv u' v' Fuu' Fvv'. apply CondP'; auto.
